title: There shall be no size restriction for bath or water closet unit
clause_text: There shall be no size restriction for bath or water closet unit. Moreover, for bathroom, water closet or kitchen, there shall be no stipulation of one wall abutting open space, etc. as long as artificial light & ventilation through any means are provided.
section: Relaxation in Building and Other Requirements

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
